name: Maia Hope
what_you_do: Crisis-Proof Leadership equips business leaders with the mindset, tools, and strategies to remain calm, clear, and confident—no matter what challenges arise.
who_you_serve: Executives, team leaders, and organizational decision-makers who carry big responsibilities and need real support.
offering: Keynote Speaking, Coaching Program, and Confidant on Retainer services.
business_focus: Equipping business leaders with the mindset, tools, and strategies to remain calm, clear, and confident in the face of challenges.
service_provided: Keynote Speaking, Coaching Program, Confidant on Retainer
